snippet: Apocalyptic films are the flavor of the month, and the most recent ones are extra-dark and intimate, like “Seeking a Friend for the End of the World.”
abstract: Dark, intimate, apocalyptic, end-of-the-world films, like Seeking a Friend for the End of the World starring Steve Carell and Keira Knightley, are Hollywood's newest flavor of the month; latest films are unlike recent disaster spectacles or post-disaster zombie survival stories, but pre-apocalyptic movies that moviegoers can relate to in troubled times.
